   16: 
   17: -module(privacy_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -define(SLEEP_TIME, 50).
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Suite configuration
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [{group, management},
   32:      {group, blocking}
   33:     ].
   34: 
   35: groups() ->
   36:     [{management, [sequence], management_test_cases()},
   37:      {blocking, [sequence], blocking_test_cases()}
   38:     ].
   39: management_test_cases() ->
   40:     [get_all_lists,
   41:     get_existing_list,
   42:     get_many_lists,
   43:     get_nonexistent_list,
   44:     set_list,
   45:     activate,
   46:     activate_nonexistent,
   47:     deactivate,
   48:     default,
   49:     %default_conflict,  % fails, as of bug #7073
   50:     default_nonexistent,
   51:     no_default,
   52:     remove_list,
   53:     get_all_lists_with_active
   54:     %get_all_lists_with_default
   55:     % not implemented (see testcase)
   56:     ].
   57: 
   58: blocking_test_cases() ->
   59:     [block_jid_message,
   60:     block_group_message,
   61:     block_subscription_message,
   62:     block_all_message,
   63:     block_jid_presence_in,
   64:     block_jid_presence_out,
   65:     block_jid_iq,
   66:     block_jid_all,
   67:     block_jid_message_but_not_presence
   68:     ].
   69: 
   70: suite() ->
   71:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   72: 
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Init & teardown
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     [{escalus_no_stanzas_after_story, true} |
   79:      escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   88:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   91:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   92: 
   93: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   94:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   95: 
   96: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   97: %% Tests
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: 
  100: %% TODO:
  101: %% x get all privacy lists
  102: %% x get single privacy list
  103: %%   x that exists
  104: %%   x that doesn't exist (ensure server returns item-not-found)
  105: %%   x request more than one at a time (ensure server returns bad-request)
  106: %% x set new/edit privacy list (ensure server pushes notifications
  107: %%   to all resources)
  108: %% - remove existing list
  109: %%   x remove existing list (ensure server push)
  110: %%   - remove, but check conflict case
  111: %% x manage active list(s)
  112: %%   x activate
  113: %%   x activate nonexistent (ensure item-not-found)
  114: %%   x deactivate by sending empty <active />
  115: %% - manage default list
  116: %%   x set default
  117: %%   - set default, but check the conflict case, i.e.:
  118: %%     "Client attempts to change the default list but that list is in use
  119: %%     by another resource",
  120: %%     !!! ejabberd doesn't support this, bug filed (#7073)
  121: %%   x set nonexistent default list
  122: %%   x use domain's routing, i.e. no default list -> send empty <default />
  123: %%   - set no default list, but check conflict case,
  124: %%     when a resource currently uses the default list
  125: %%
  126: %% TODO later:
  127: %% - big picture:
  128: %%   - blocking can be done on jids, roster groups,
  129: %%     subscription type or globally
  130: %%   - a blocking rule may block one or more of {message, presence-in,
  131: %%     presence-out, iqs} by specifying these as children to the list item
  132: %%     or block all of them, when the item has no children
  133: %% - blocking: messages, presence (in/out), iqs, all
  134: 
  135: get_all_lists(Config) ->
  136:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  137: 
  138:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  139:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  140: 
  141:         end).
  142: 
  143: get_all_lists_with_active(Config) ->
  144:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  145: 
  146:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  147: 
  148:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  149:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result_with_active, [<<"deny_bob">>],
  150:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  151: 
  152:         end).
  153: 
  154: %% Black box testing showed that this feature is not implemented,
  155: %% i.e. the <default /> element is never returned by ejabberd.
  156: %% However, I'm not 100% sure, as I didn't look inside the source.
  157: get_all_lists_with_default(Config) ->
  158:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  159: 
  160:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  161:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"allow_bob">>),
  162: 
  163:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  164:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result_with_default,
  165:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  166: 
  167:         end).
  168: 
  169: get_nonexistent_list(Config) ->
  170:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  171: 
  172:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  173:             escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"public">>])),
  174:         escalus_assert:is_privacy_list_nonexistent_error(
  175:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  176: 
  177:         end).
  178: 
  179: get_many_lists(Config) ->
  180:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  181: 
  182:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"public">>, <<"private">>]),
  183:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  184:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  185:         escalus_assert:is_error(Response, <<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>)
  186: 
  187:         end).
  188: 
  189: get_existing_list(Config) ->
  190:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  191: 
  192:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  193: 
  194:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"deny_bob">>])),
  195:         Response = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  196: 
  197:         <<"deny_bob">> = exml_query:path(Response, [{element, <<"query">>},
  198:                                                     {element, <<"list">>},
  199:                                                     {attr, <<"name">>}])
  200: 
  201:         end).
  202: 
  203: activate(Config) ->
  204:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  205: 
  206:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  207: 
  208:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_bob">>),
  209:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  210: 
  211:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  212:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  213: 
  214:         end).
  215: 
  216: activate_nonexistent(Config) ->
  217:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  218: 
  219:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"some_list">>),
  220:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  221: 
  222:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  223:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>], Response)
  224: 
  225:         end).
  226: 
  227: deactivate(Config) ->
  228:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  229: 
  230:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_deactivate(),
  231:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  232: 
  233:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  234:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  235: 
  236:         end).
  237: 
  238: default(Config) ->
  239:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  240: 
  241:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  242: 
  243:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"deny_bob">>),
  244:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  245: 
  246:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  247:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  248: 
  249:         end).
  250: 
  251: default_conflict(Config) ->
  252:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Alice2, _Bob) ->
  253: 
  254:         %% testcase setup
  255:         %% setup list on server
  256:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  257:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"allow_bob">>),
  258:         %% skip responses
  259:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 4),
  260:         %% make a default list for Alice2
  261:         R1 = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(Alice2, <<"deny_bob">>),
  262:         escalus_client:send(Alice2, R1),
  263:         escalus:assert_many([is_privacy_set, is_privacy_set, is_iq_result],
  264:                             escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3)),
  265:         %% setup done
  266: 
  267:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"allow_bob">>),
  268:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  269: 
  270:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  271:         %% TODO: should fail on this (result) and receive error
  272:         %%       this is a bug and was filed to the esl redmine as Bug #7073
  273:         %true = exmpp_iq:is_result(Response),
  274:         %% but this should pass just fine
  275:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"conflict">>], Response)
  276: 
  277:         end).
  278: 
  279: default_nonexistent(Config) ->
  280:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  281: 
  282:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"some_list">>),
  283:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  284: 
  285:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  286:         escalus_assert:is_error(Response, <<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>)
  287: 
  288:         end).
  289: 
  290: no_default(Config) ->
  291:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  292: 
  293:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_no_default(),
  294:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  295: 
  296:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  297:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  298: 
  299:         end).
  300: 
  301: set_list(Config) ->
  302:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 3}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Alice2, Alice3, _Bob) ->
  303: 
  304:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  305: 
  306:         %% Verify that original Alice gets iq result and notification.
  307:         %% It's a bit quirky as these come in undefined order
  308:         %% (actually, they always came with 'push' first and then 'result',
  309:         %% but I suppose it's not mandatory).
  310:         AliceResponses = escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  311:         escalus:assert_many([
  312:             fun escalus_pred:is_iq_result/1,
  313:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1
  314:         ], AliceResponses),
  315: 
  316:         %% Verify that other resources also get the push.
  317:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  318:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2)),
  319:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  320:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice3))
  321: 
  322:         %% All in all, the spec requires the resources to reply
  323:         %% (as to every iq), but it's omitted here.
  324: 
  325:         end).
  326: 
  327: remove_list(Config) ->
  328:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  329: 
  330:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  331: 
  332:         %% These are the pushed notification and iq result.
  333:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  334: 
  335:         %% Request list deletion by sending an empty list.
  336:         RemoveRequest = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_list(
  337:                 escalus_stanza:privacy_list(<<"someList">>, [])),
  338:         escalus_client:send(Alice, RemoveRequest),
  339: 
  340:         %% These too are the pushed notification and iq result.
  341:         escalus:assert_many([
  342:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  343:             is_iq_result
  344:         ], escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  345: 
  346:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  347:             escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"someList">>])),
  348: 
  349:         %% Finally ensure that the list doesn't exist anymore.
  350:         escalus_assert:is_privacy_list_nonexistent_error(
  351:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  352: 
  353:         end).
  354: 
  355: block_jid_message(Config) ->
  356:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  357: 
  358:         %% Alice should receive message
  359:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  360:             escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi! What's your name?">>)),
  361:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi! What's your name?">>,
  362:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  363: 
  364:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  365:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_message">>),
  366: 
  367:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  368:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  369:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  370:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  371: 
  372:         end).
  373: 
  374: block_group_message(Config) ->
  375:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  376: 
  377:         %% Alice should receive message
  378:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  379:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  380:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  381: 
  382:         %% add Bob to Alices' group 'ignored'
  383:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, [<<"ignored">>], <<"Ugly Bastard">>),
  384: 
  385:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  386:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_message">>),
  387: 
  388:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  389:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  390:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  391:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  392: 
  393:         end).
  394: 
  395: block_subscription_message(Config) ->
  396:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  397: 
  398:         %% Alice should receive message
  399:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  400:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  401:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  402: 
  403:         %% Alice sends unsubscribe
  404:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  405:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"unsubscribe">>)),
  406: 
  407:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  408:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_unsubscribed_message">>),
  409: 
  410:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  411:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  412:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  413:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  414: 
  415:         end).
  416: 
  417: block_all_message(Config) ->
  418:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  419: 
  420:         %% Alice should receive message
  421:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  422:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  423:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  424: 
  425:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  426:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_all_message">>),
  427: 
  428:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  429:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  430:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  431:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  432: 
  433:         end).
  434: 
  435: block_jid_presence_in(Config) ->
  436:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  437: 
  438:         %% Alice should receive presence in
  439:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  440:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  441:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  442:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  443:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Bob, Received),
  444: 
  445:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_presence_in">>),
  446: 
  447:         %% Alice should NOT receive presence in
  448:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  449:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  450:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  451:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  452: 
  453:         end).
  454: 
  455: block_jid_presence_out(Config) ->
  456:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  457: 
  458:         %% Bob should receive presence in
  459:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  460:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  461:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  462:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  463:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Alice, Received),
  464: 
  465:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_presence_out">>),
  466: 
  467:         %% Bob should NOT receive presence in
  468:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  469:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  470: 
  471:         %% Alice gets an error back from mod_privacy
  472:         Presence = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  473:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"error">>], Presence),
  474: 
  475:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  476:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
  477: 
  478:         end).
  479: 
  480: block_jid_iq(Config) ->
  481:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  482: 
  483:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_localhost_iq">>),
  484:         %% activate it
  485:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  486:             escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_localhost_iq">>)),
  487:         %% From now on no iq replies should reach Alice.
  488:         %% That's also the reason why we couldn't use
  489:         %% the privacy_helper:set_and_activate helper - it waits for all replies.
  490: 
  491:         %% Just set the toy list and ensure that only
  492:         %% the notification push comes back.
  493:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  494:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  495:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1, Response),
  496:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  497:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  498: 
  499:         end).
  500: 
  501: block_jid_all(Config) ->
  502:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  503: 
  504:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_jid_all">>),
  505: 
  506:         %% Alice blocks Bob
  507:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  508:             escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_jid_all">>)),
  509:         %% IQ response is blocked;
  510:         %% do magic wait for the request to take effect
  511:         timer:sleep(200),
  512: 
  513:         %% From now on nothing whatsoever sent by Bob should reach Alice.
  514: 
  515:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  516:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  517: 
  518:         %% Alice should NOT receive presence-in from Bob
  519:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  520:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  521: 
  522:         %% Bob should NOT receive presence-in from Alice
  523:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  524:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  525: 
  526:         %% Just set the toy list and ensure that only
  527:         %% the notification push comes back.
  528:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  529: 
  530:         %% verify
  531:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  532:         %% ...that nothing reached Bob
  533:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  534:         %% ...that Alice got exactly two responses
  535:         Responses = escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  536:         %% one of which is a push and the other a presence error
  537:         escalus:assert_many([
  538:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  539:             fun privacy_helper:is_presence_error/1
  540:         ], Responses),
  541:         %% and Alice didn't get anything else
  542:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  543: 
  544:         end).
  545: 
  546: block_jid_message_but_not_presence(Config) ->
  547:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  548: 
  549:         %% Alice should receive message
  550:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  551:             escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi! What's your name?">>)),
  552:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi! What's your name?">>,
  553:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  554: 
  555:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  556:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_message">>),
  557: 
  558:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  559:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  560:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  561:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  562: 
  563:         %% ...but should receive presence in
  564:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  565:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(Alice, <<"available">>)),
  566:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  567:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  568:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Bob, Received)
  569: 
  570:         end).
  571: 
  572: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  573: %% Helpers
  574: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  575: 
  576: add_sample_contact(Who, Whom, Groups, Nick) ->
  577:     escalus_client:send(Who,
  578:                         escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Whom,
  579:                                                           Groups,
  580:                                                           Nick)),
  581:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Who),
  582:     escalus_assert:is_roster_set(Received),
  583:     escalus_client:send(Who, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  584:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Who)).
